articles.content:
Tyson Fury has revealed that he recently received a phone call asking if he would be keen to take on his namesake Mike Tyson in a sensational bout in order to raise money for charity.

articles.title: Christian Mbulu death: Morecambe defender dies aged 23 - The Independent
articles.description: Mbulu made seven appearances for Crewe after signing a short-term deal in October and signed for fellow League Two side Morecambe in January
articles.content:
Morecambe defender Christian Mbulu has died at the age of 23, the League Two club have confirmed.

articles.title: Adam Lallana transfer race hots up as Burnley join five-club fight for Liverpool star - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Liverpool midfielder looks certain to end his six-year stay at Anfield at the end of the current season, and he has plenty of suitors interested in him
articles.content:
Burnley are the latest club to join the race for Liverpool's Adam Lallana as Sean Dyche bids to convince the midfielder to make the move to Turf Moor.
